tags: Electrical measuring and testing equipment and accessories
full_summary:
### [English]
**Notice ID:** 01800-230873
**Title:** Hydraulic Soil Sampler Tender
**Reference Number:** WS4095589142-Doc4097735023
**Status:** **Cancelled**

**Contract Overview:**
The Government of Canada's Department of Engineering (PSPC) is seeking proposals from qualified Offerors to supply a hydraulic soil sampler for the St. John’s Research and Development Centre of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada.

**Request for Proposal:**
This Request for Proposal (RFP) outlines the requirements for the hydraulic soil sampler and includes the following details:

• **Goods and Services Classification:** *UNSPSC Codes*: *Electrical measuring and testing equipment and accessories* (41113600), *Soil measuring equipment* (41113900)
• **Trade Agreements:** The contract is subject to the **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**
• **Regions of Delivery:** St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador
• **Estimated Contract Value:** TBD
• **Contract Duration:** The contract is expected to commence on an unspecified date and end on 2023-11-30

**Important Information:**

• To participate in this tender, suppliers must be registered in the Government of Canada's online procurement platform (CanadaBuys). Suppliers who are new to this platform can find instructions and support on the [CanadaBuys Getting Started page](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/getting-started).
• Amendments to the RFP will be posted in the Event Messages board on SAP Ariba.
• Questions regarding the technical requirements of this tender should be submitted via the Event Messages board on SAP Ariba.

**Contact Information:**

For more information, please contact Genevieve Petten at [genevieve.petten@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:genevieve.petten@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

(Note: Although this notice is currently **Cancelled**, [previous posts](link if applicable) provide further details.)
